statements: SELECT * FROM user_recommendations;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id FROM user_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recommendation_description FROM user_recommendations WHERE device_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM user_recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'movie' ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS recommendation_count FROM user_recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING recommendation_count > 2;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_description FROM user_recommendations WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'TvShow' AND user_id = 100 ORDER BY recommendation_id ASC;
SELECT recommendation_id, device_id, user_id FROM user_recommendations WHERE recommendation_description LIKE '%action%' ORDER BY user_id, device_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS number_of_recommendations FROM user_recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(recommendation_id) > 2 ORDER BY number_of_recommendations DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_type FROM user_recommendations WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY device_id ASC,recommendation_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM UserProfiles WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT user_id, device_type, data_type FROM DeviceData WHERE device_type = 'MobilePhone' ORDER BY data_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE timestamp > '2021-09-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, age, location FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND data_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM DeviceData GROUP BY user_id HAVING device_count > 5 ORDER BY device_count DESC;
SELECT username, age, location FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM DeviceData GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_value > 50 ORDER BY avg_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM smart_tv_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, duration FROM smart_tv_data WHERE video_viewed = 'Movie';
SELECT user_id, heart_rate FROM wearable_devices_data WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, video_viewed FROM smart_tv_data WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM wearable_devices_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT device_id, user_id, steps_count FROM wearable_devices_data WHERE steps_count > 5000 ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_id, brand, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE brand = 'Samsung';
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_devices;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, device_type, brand FROM user_devices WHERE brand = 'Apple';
SELECT u.username, d.device_type, dd.data_type FROM users u JOIN user_devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN device_data dd ON d.device_id = dd.device_id;
SELECT r.recommendation_text, r.recommendation_date FROM recommendations r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_timestamp FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT device_id, data_type, data_value FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female';
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_timestamp FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_type, d.last_connection, u.name, u.age FROM devices d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.id WHERE u.age < 40 ORDER BY d.last_connection ASC;
